tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Boat Crash at Lake of the Ozarks in Missouri
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: A boating accident at Lake of the Ozarks in Missouri was captured on a shocking video last Friday. The crash happened when the Fountain powerboat plowed into a large wake of another vessel at high speed. The boat slammed from side to side causing injuries to the driver and six passengers. Five were taken to a nearby hospital to be treated for minor to moderate injuries.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Dude the guy in blue,﻿ (back right) gave the boat 3 of the best head butts I've ever seen! Surprised he didn't get knocked out, on the other hand I think the driver and the chick in the pink were.
LOL!﻿
WHY IN THE WORLD THESE BOATS DONT HAVE QUICK RELEASE RACING HARNESS!!! i always wonder i canyon race bikes and﻿ i wish i could have a `seatbelt` but these clowns have seats...comon
I don't get why they just didn't slow the fuck down! Am I missing something? Sorry to admit﻿ this is pretty fucking hilarious though! LMAOOOO
oh, that shit was hilarious. driver went down as﻿ if he'd been cold-cocked
The dumb guy driving almost killed people trying to be a﻿ big shot.
LMAO. bald dude is like " im﻿ cool. i got this. BAM! oh shit, im flat on the ground"
so funny﻿
right......or find the marbles.﻿
Press 5 over﻿ and over.. LMAO. It sucks what happend though
Yes. you know alien's like to mess with boaters. ﻿
classic!﻿
me neither. It's 1:30 in the﻿ morning and I'm fucking laughing my ASS OFF!!!!
Did anybody else﻿ notice the UFO at 0:21 on the top right?
Oh﻿ my god the girl in the pink must have been in so much pain..
dude, your feeding the trolls... just let him revel in﻿ his own stupidity, don't let it suck you in.
0:37﻿ girl-on-girl action!
Lol the girl﻿ in the pink didn't think it was so fun anymore after that first head banging. Did you see the look on her face? hahaha
I'm begging somebody to redo this video in super slo-mo. ﻿
group﻿ headbang!!
Now﻿ it's time to play find the sunglasses.
That could have ended up so much﻿ worse.

how is that fun, riding in a boat, getting sun burned, eating diesel fumes as air, and then getting worked and beat up.. ohh﻿ I can 't wait to go boating again.. just get a paddle boat and do a workout at least!

Reviewer.Movies: sin city, pulp.f, 25th hour, ronin, heat, the cell, kill bill, spirited away, howls moving castle, castle in the sky, initial d, Tokyo dorift...jdm option, bmi, hot version, top gear, man vs wield, history chnl, discovery, food net work, iron chef japanese version,ftv, great teacher onizuka, space cowboys, cowboy beebop.
Reviewer.Music: progressive house, progressive trance, psy trance, deep trance, chillout, all rock, some country, classical, piano, all jazz, blues, spanish and more...
